attributes.action: Increase the NHS budget by the £350million per week that was given to the EU.
attributes.additional_details:
Taken from <http://www.voteleavetakecontrol.org/why_vote_leave> on 24/06/16: 'We will be able to save £350 million a week. We can spend our money on our priorities like the NHS'.

The Leave camp should be bound by the arguments of their campaign else democracy has malfunctioned in this referendum.
attributes.background: Throughout the 'Brexit' referendum in the UK, the Leave campaign persistently argued that the UK sent £350million a week into the EU, and that that money should instead be sent to the NHS. Following the vote to leave the EU, this argument should be put into practice.
